name: ProAltus Group
description: ProAltus Group delivers access‑led safety solutions—fall protection, rope access, debris containment, façade and roof maintenance—ensuring safe, compliant, and practical work-at-height services.

name: Access Strategy & Design
serviceType: Site surveys, access route planning, compliance consulting
description: Bespoke planning and design for safe and compliant access, including site surveys, stakeholder collaboration and route mapping for long‑term asset management.

name: Fall Protection Consultancy
serviceType: Consulting and compliance strategy for fall protection systems
description: Strategic consultancy for designing and reviewing fall protection systems to meet modern safety standards and client-specific needs.

name: Fall Protection Supply, Install & Certify
serviceType: Design, supply, installation, testing & certification of fall protection systems
description: Complete service for permanent fall protection systems including supply, install and re-certification.

name: Fall Protection Testing & Inspection
serviceType: Inspection and testing of fall protection systems
description: Certified inspection and testing of fixed fall protection systems across a range of building types.

name: Works at Height Consulting
serviceType: Consulting on safe work at height strategies and compliance
description: Expert guidance for businesses planning or managing work at height, ensuring regulatory compliance and operational safety.

name: Bespoke Debris Netting Solutions
serviceType: Design and implementation of netting systems for debris and bird protection
description: Tailored netting and containment solutions for public protection during construction, maintenance and access work.

name: Facilities Management Services
serviceType: Planned and reactive building fabric maintenance
description: Support for FM providers and managing agents with specialist access maintenance and building fabric services.

name: External Cleaning
serviceType: Specialist high-level cleaning services for building exteriors
description: Safe and effective cleaning services for roofs, facades, signage and glazing using rope access and temporary systems.

name: Glazing
description: Safe and precise glazing works carried out via rope access, MEWPs and other compliant access systems.

name: Roofing
serviceType: Roof repair and maintenance across systems
description: High-level roofing services for slate, tiled and flat systems with full access planning and integrated fall protection.
